name: Artoo, I Have A Bad Feeling About This
Lore: '''He says our instructions are to give it only to Jabba himself. I''m terrible sorry. I''m afraid he''s ever so stubborn about these sort of things.''',
Text: 'If you are about to draw a battle destiny, instead use the destiny number of one of your droids in that battle. OR Add 1 to attrition against opponent for each droid you have in that battle. OR If R2-D2 and C-3PO are in battle together, opponent draws no battle destiny.',
